Camoflage::

She wandered into the mess hall to hear Malice.  She started to 
pout. "I didn't mean to make you mad. I was just trying to help Kup 
find Nightlight. I'm sorry."  She started to sniffle as she was about 
to cry.

Wolfblade:
She looked at Cam. "Oh no you don't fox bot. Don't start crying now. 
He's not mad. Just that you didn't have to blast out our audio 
sensors for that. You could have opened up a direct channel and 
called her. Sheesh kid, your enough to drive a bot crazy."

Camoflage:
She started crying, "I'm sorry." She cried and tears ran down her 
little face plates. She ran out of the mess hall and to her old room.

Wolfblade::
She rolled her optics. "Kids, a war is no place for them."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice managed to say,"Don't worry, I won't tell." when Camoflage 
yelled through the intercom for Nightlight.  Malice's audios were 
ringing.
> "Holy slag child, yell a little bit louder, the dead didn't quite 
hear that!"
> 
>
